data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I have been a member of a group called Peer Network. Members of the group all wear orange T-shirts. The group is designed for the volunteer program where senior university students get elected and trained to help new students during orientation weeks. The volunteer activities involve showing new students the way to their destinations on the campus, answering their questions relating to course enrolment, university life, and so forth. As the transition period from high school or other stages of one's life to university could be fresh and difficult at the same time, it would be really nice to have someone by your side who can help you out. The place our group members met up was the Peer Network office located on level four of the home building while the training took place on level thirty. (137字)
data.referenceText: Describe a group or a club that you have been a member of. What is the group for? Where did you meet up?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一个你曾经参加过的团体或俱乐部。这个团体是干什么的?你们在哪里见面的?
